"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547cfe7b63687246fcb80200#post_547cfe7b63687246fcb80200
I will make the shipping even more worst

I looped the song

Go to "this link,":http://labs.echonest.com/Uploader/index.html?trid=TRJSXJZ14A083C5D04&d=493,500,551,671,728,731,738,792&jb=1&lg=1&sq=0&thresh=25&bp=100,100,100 click on "Tune," then when the box pops up, click on the box marked "loop extension optimization" to deselect it. The line that remains is the looping point, just play it *_+but make sure it's in another window and not another tab or else it won't play.+_* Congration, you now have an infinitely looping song.

topics.body:
If you fall from a height;
A normal friend would help you up if you ask.
A good friend would help you up without asking.
A great friend would help you up without asking and ask how you're doing.

A true friend would either laugh or panic first before helping you.
